thread.title: 'Liverpool's best January signing ever' - Reds fans delighted by Gerrard's return
thread.title_full: 'Liverpool's best January signing ever' - Reds fans delighted by Gerrard's return

title: 'Liverpool's best January signing ever' - Reds fans delighted by Gerrard's return
text:
0 20 Jan 2017 19:53:18 Reds fans expressed their absolute jubilation as the 36-year-old Anfield legend confirmed his return to the club where he won the Champions League 
Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard has announced his next club - he's going back to the Reds to become a coach at their academy. 
The news delighted the club's fans, who could not be more excited to see the former Champions League winner back at the club.
